H0.text: Birchill, Thornhill and Lisvane are all areas of which British city. Cardiff

H1.text: Birchill, Thornhill and Lisvane are all areas of which British city. Bristol

H2.text: Birchill, Thornhill and Lisvane are all areas of which British city. Swansea

H3.text: Birchill, Thornhill and Lisvane are all areas of which British city. 029

A4.text: Thornhill and Lisvane lie in an arc from the north-west to the north-east of the centre of Cardiff.
